attributes.action: Allow Shamima Begums newborn son to return to UK for adoption...
attributes.additional_details: There are plenty of people in the UK who would willingly adopt a new born...
attributes.background: Shamima Begum has had her citizenship of the UK removed, she has shown no remorse. However the innocent newborn baby should not suffer from malnutrition, and a painful death because of it's mother!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to decide whether a child should be adopted or not.
